original_text: And immediately he called them, and they left their father Zebedee in the boat with the hired servants and followed him.
korean_text: 곧 부르시니 그 아버지 세베대를 품꾼들과 함께 배에 버려 두고 예수를 따라가니라

sentences.original_text: and they left their father Zebedee in the boat with the hired servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아버지 세베대를 품꾼들과 함께 배에 두고
